n, k = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
p = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
q = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

if k == 1:
    print("YES")
    print(n * "a")
    exit(0)

letters = list(map(chr, range(97, 97 + k)))

s = [None] * n
s[p[0] - 1] = letters[0]
s[q[0] - 1] = letters[1]

for i in range(1, n):
    if s[p[i] - 1] is None:
        s[p[i] - 1] = s[p[i - 1] - 1]
    if s[q[i] - 1] is None:
        s[q[i] - 1] = s[q[i - 1] - 1]
    if s[p[i] - 1] == s[q[i] - 1]:
        print("NO")
        exit(0)

for i in range(k, n):
    s[p[i] - 1] = s[q[i] - 1] = letters[i % k]

print("YES")
print("".join(s))


def main():
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    p = list(map(int, input().split()))
    q = list(map(int, input().split()))
    s = [None for i in range(n)]
    for i in range(k):
        s[p[i]] = chr(ord("a") + i)
        s[q[i]] = chr(ord("a") + i)
    for i in range(k, n):
        s[p[i]] = s[q[i]] = s[p[i - 1]]
    print("YES")
    print("".join(s))

main()

def main():
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    p = list(map(int, input().split()))
    q = list(map(int, input().split()))
    p = [i - 1 for i in p]
    q = [i - 1 for i in q]
    s = ["*" for i in range(n)]
    for i in range(k):
        s[p[i]] = chr(ord("a") + i)
        s[q[i]] = chr(ord("a") + i)
    for i in range(k, n):
        s[p[i]] = s[q[i]] = s[p[i - k]]
    print("YES")
    print("".join(s))

main()


def main():
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    p = list(map(int, input().split()))[:k]
    q = list(map(int, input().split()))[:k]
    p = [i - 1 for i in p]
    q = [i - 1 for i in q]
    s = [None for i in range(n)]
    for i in range(k):
        s[p[i]] = chr(ord("a") + i)
        s[q[i]] = chr(ord("a") + i)
    for i in range(k, n):
        s[p[i]] = s[q[i]] = s[p[i - 1]]
    print("YES")
    print("".join(s))

main()


def main():
    n, k = map(int, input().split())   # 入力
    p = list(map(int, input().split()))    # 入力
    q = list(map(int, input().split()))    # 入力
    p = [i - 1 for i in p]   # 0始まりに変換
    q = [i - 1 for i in q]   # 0始まりに変換
    s = [None for i in range(n)]  # 文字列
    for i in range(k):    # 文字列を作る
        s[p[i]] = chr(ord("a") + i)    # 文字列を作る
        s[q[i]] = chr(ord("a") + i)    # 文字列を作る
    for i in range(k, n):     # 文字列を作る
        s[p[i]] = s[q[i]] = s[p[i - 1]]   # 文字列を作る
    print("YES")   # 出力
    print("".join(s))  # 出力

main()

q = [2] + [int(x) for x in input().split()]

letters = list(map(chr, range(97, 97 + k)))

s = [None] * n
s[q[0] - 1] = letters[0]

for i in range(1, n + 1):

        s[p[i] - 1] = s[p[i - 1] - 1]
    if s[q[i] - 1] is None:
        s[q[i] - 1] = s[q[i - 1] - 1]
    if s[p[i] - 1] == s[q[i] - 1]:
        print("NO")
        exit(0)

for i in range(k, n + 1):
    if s[p[i] - 1] is None:
        s[p[i] - 1] = letters[i % k]
    if s[q[i] - 1] is None:
        s[q[i] - 1] = letters[i % k]

print("YES")
print("".join(s))
#!/usr/bin/env python3

n, k = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
p = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
q = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

if k == 1:
    print("YES")
    print(n * "a")
    exit(0)

letters = list(map(chr, range(97, 97 + k)))

s = [None] * n
s[p[0] - 1] = letters[0]
s[q[0] - 1] = letters[1]

for i in range(1, n):
    if s[p[i] - 1] is None:
        s[p[i] - 1] = s[p[i - 1] - 1]
    if s[q[i] - 1] is None:
        s[q[i] - 1] = s[q[i - 1] - 1]
    if s[p[i] - 1] == s[q[i] - 1]:
        print("NO")
        exit(0)

for i in range(k, n):
    s[p[i] - 1] = s[q[i] - 1] = letters[i % k]

print("YES")
print("".join(s))


def main():
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    p = list(map(int, input().split()))
    q = list(map(int, input().split()))
    p = [i - 1 for i in p]
    q = [i - 1 for i in q]
    s = ["" for i in range(n)]
    for i in range(k):
        s[p[i]] = chr(ord("a") + i)
        s[q[i]] = chr(ord("a") + i)
    for i in range(k, n):
        s[p[i]] = s[q[i]] = s[p[i - k]]
    print("YES")
    print("".join(s))

main()
